message: Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $20000. It's truly one-of-a-kind and worth every penny. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is unique, but given my budget, I would like to propose a price of $15000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I can come down to $17500, but that's the lowest I can go. This product is truly exceptional, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value and uniqueness of the product, I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
